resources.string: Please Enter Your Username and Password.
Are you sure you want to close the app?
Are you sure you want log out?

The indusTech app is an app that is use to get information on a machine by scanning a custom QR_code that will be given to a certain machine. The app has a login page where the username is "industech" and the password is "password". After you login you will see to button a scan and real time value button. The scan button will lead you to the new page and click the click to scan button and the camera will turn on the and then you will be able to scan in a QR_code or press back to cancel the scan. After the scan is complete you will sent to the data page which will display the input and then send the that input into the database online.Press back again to go to the main page. The real time value button will take you to a new page were it will display the temperature, voltage,error message, and id number of the first machine. Also right below it you can get the values of another machine by entering in the id number of the machine and clicking the search button.
